# Dynamic Rules - Top Avoidable Mistakes

*Auto-generated from 106 recorded errors. Last updated: 2025-12-10 22:34 UTC*

## Rule 1: Avoid Syntax Errors (80 occurrences)

**Common Problem:** TypeScript compilation failed: npx/tsc not found. Ensure Node.js and TypeScript are installed.

**Prevention:** Will retry with error feedback

---

## Rule 2: Avoid Builder Errors (21 occurrences)

**Common Problem:** Builder returned empty or malformed response

**Prevention:** Will retry with same inputs

---

## Rule 3: Avoid Visual Errors (5 occurrences)

**Common Problem:** Visual QA failed: FAIL: [Multiple visual problems detected]

1. **Text Readability Issues:**
   - Text is extremely small and difficult to read on mobile
   - Multiple sections appear compressed with poor line spacing
   - Headers and body text have insufficient contrast/hierarchy

2. **Layout Problems:**
   - Conten

**Prevention:** Will retry with visual feedback

---
